# Deft Dodger (Trait)
## Overview
**Deft Dodger**: Growing up in a rough neighborhood or a dangerous environment has honed your senses. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Reflex saves. 

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 52
